Full Description: Kalshi is a federally regulated financial exchange that allows investors to trade directly on the anticipated outcome of future events. Kalshi’s markets cover a wide range of topics including economics, international affairs, media and entertainment, climate/weather, and public health. Because Kalshi’s market topics can be more specific than other instruments like stocks or bonds, investors can get direct exposure to the events and trends that they are interested in. For example, a Kalshi market on whether a certain free trade agreement will be signed can help retail investors get exposure to emerging markets and fluctuations in international trade. Website: https://kalshi.com

Industries: Bioinformatics, Biotechnology, Genetics, Life Science
Description: Parse Biosciences is a biotechnology startup company that develops single-cell sequencing kit solutions for researchers.
Top 5 Investors: National Science Foundation, Soleus Capital, Janus Henderson Investors, Horizon Technology Finance, Marshall Wace
Founders: Alex Rosenberg, Charles Roco, Georg Friedrich Seelig
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Full Description: Parse Bio is a biotechnology startup company developing single-cell sequencing kit solutions for researchers. By using combinatorial cDNA barcoding within cells themselves, Parse Biosciences’s technology allows researchers to eliminate the need for complex and expensive microfluidic instruments. Additionally, the company’s technology enables samples to be fixed, frozen, and stored, allowing researchers to separate out the sample extraction from downstream library preparation steps. This capability empowers researchers to run fixed samples collected on different dates together in a single experiment, providing greater control over sample handling and reducing handling errors. Split Biosciences rebranded as Parse Biosciences in 2020. The Seattle, Washington-based biotech company was established in 2018 by Alex Rosenberg, Charlie Roco, and Georg Friedrich Seelig.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Penetration Testing, Quality Assurance, Software
Description: Antithesis is a cloud platform that autonomously tests software reliability in a simulated environment without impacting production.
Top 5 Investors: Amplify Partners, Tamarack Global, First In Ventures, Spark Capital, Howard Lerman
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Antithesis is a cloud platform that automates software reliability testing in a simulated environment without affecting production systems. It continuously analyzes software behavior, detects issues, and reproduces problems in a fully deterministic setting. By introducing faults such as network retries and thread hangs, the platform identifies rare errors and explores multiple possible outcomes. Developers can test software under various conditions, define specific properties for validation, and trace issues back to their root causes. Antithesis enables efficient debugging by providing detailed system state tracking and the ability to replay every moment leading to an issue.

Full Description: Sunthetics enables process chemists in pharma to develop electrochemical lead molecules in 1/10th of the time. Electrochemistry has many operational, cost, and sustainable benefits such as using 40% less energy, avoiding toxic chemicals and waste, and enabling new types of molecules. Despite interest in pharmaceuticals to develop electrochemical molecules, many molecules don't make it past process development. For most applications, the many years of optimization and additional training required don't justify the energy and cost savings. Sunthetics develops smart electrochemical reactors that enable process chemists to develop at-scale processes in 1/10th of the time. Our effective hardware is scalable and effective, and enables fast results through a machine-learning platform that is automatic and predictive, reducing the experiments needed for development by 10x. Though the beachhead market is pharmaceuticals, Sunthetics has a platform technology that can be scaled and applied to follow-on markets such as agrochemicals and specialty chemicals, spearheading the electrification of the chemical industry.

Headquartered in Türkiye and the United States, Simularge serves global manufacturers with plug-and-play digital twin solutions that integrate directly with factory PLCs, enabling rapid deployment and ROI. Simularge’s mission is to transform industrial intelligence by embedding real-time decision-making into the heart of production.

Full Description: Alan AI transforms enterprise software with a new approach, Adaptive App AI. Instead of relying on manual development or isolated AI tools, we embed an intelligent layer into your application that builds features on demand.   Powered by our proprietary Three-Layer AI (3LAI) architecture, our system generates business logic and UI in real time, with less reliance on developers. It works across your entire app stack: the user interface, business logic, and data management.   Our Product – The Intelligent App Platform   The Intelligent App Platform lets companies integrate agentic interfaces into their existing apps in days, not months. It creates a constrained and validated environment from your app’s APIs, GUIs, and documentation, enabling AI for accurate, context-aware code generation. At runtime, the AI acts like a self-coding engine—instantly creating new features based on user needs.    Alan AI takes an agnostic approach to models, data, cloud, and applications, giving customers freedom of choice. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, CA, and with a regional presence in Hyderabad, India. The company's foundation is strengthened by the experience and vision of its founders, Andrey Ryabov and Ramu Sunkara. Their previous venture, the mobile video service Qik, achieved notable success and was acquired by Skype, underscoring their prowess in pioneering technology-driven solutions.

Industries: Machine Learning, Software
Description: Augmentir enables rapid and sustainable digital transformation for industrial companies.
Top 5 Investors: Lerer Hippeau, Holt Ventures, Pritzker Group Venture Capital, Gardner Lewis Asset Management
Founders: John Canosa, Lawrence Fan, Phil Huber, Russell Fadel
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Software
Full Description: The Augmentir™ founding team has been at the forefront of three of the most important of these software technology revolutions. In 1988, Wonderware transformed how machines run, with the introduction and mass commercialization of Human-Machine Interface software. Wonderware enabled the first software-based industrial revolution and is still in evidence today by Wonderware’s continued leadership position. In 1998, Lighthammer transformed manufacturing yet again with the introduction of the first Enterprise Manufacturing Intelligence platform. Lighthammer revolutionized the factory floor by bringing both real time intelligence and live synchronization with the ERP software layer. This enabled the second software-based industrial revolution and is still evidenced today by the ubiquity of this software (currently under the SAP MII brand). In 2008, ThingWorx catalyzed the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) with the introduction of the first application platform for IIoT. ThingWorx transformed both manufacturing and service, becoming synonymous with Industrie 4.0/Brilliant factory, and Connected Service. This enabled the 3rd software-based industrial revolution and is still evidenced today by the ubiquity of IIoT software and, the market leadership of PTC’s ThingWorx brand. In 2018, the founders of Augmentir recognized that the technology and market forces were aligned yet again, for a fourth industrial software revolution. A revolution focused on increasing the productivity & quality of processes involving front-line workers. With a global footprint of 350 million workers in manufacturing and service, they are being asked to perform increasingly complex jobs using technology that has remained relatively unchanged for 20 years. Whether this was due to neglect or the misplaced belief that robots and automation would replace all of these jobs, these users and processes have been underserved.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Health Care, Medical, Medical Device
Description: Casana is innovating healthcare delivery with a smart toilet seat that enables in-home health monitoring.
Top 5 Investors: General Catalyst, Matrix, Outsiders Fund, Launch NY, Tech Coast Angels
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Casana is changing the way healthcare does business with a smart toilet seat that enables effortless, integrated, and consistent in-home health monitoring. The Heart Seat™ captures key clinical measurements, including heart rate, blood pressure, and blood oxygenation, to assist medical teams with monitoring chronic conditions beyond the four walls of the hospital. The Heart Seat will be a FDA-cleared medical device focused on managing chronic conditions. The seat currently has three key sensors: 1. ECG (Electrocardiogram) - A single-lead ECG made up of two electrodes measure the electrical activity of the heart. 2. PPG (Photoplethysmogram)v- Red and infrared LEDs are embedded into the seat and function similar to a standard finger pulse oximeter measuring the local blood volume. 3. BCG (Ballistocardiogram) - Four sensitive weight sensors are embedded in the bumpers of the seat which measure the mechanical activity of the heart.

Its single-tenant security, real-time insights, and unified data analysis collectively bring immediate benefits to organizations navigating complex regulatory and research environments. A core product of Huma.ai is the Knowledge Hub for Life Sciences, often referred to as KHLS. The hub brings together various features—like identification of common themes, evidence generation, trending topics, comparative analysis, sentiment evaluation, and sorting or filtering of results—in one place. It can process and analyze material from advisory boards, survey data, internal files, and many other repositories that commonly hold valuable medical affairs and scientific knowledge. The platform is designed to help users uncover significant insights and trends in real time.  A key differentiator of the Huma.ai Knowledge Hub is that it merges insights across disparate repositories, the platform gives medical affairs teams a full spectrum of knowledge on competitive landscapes, drug development progress, regulatory considerations, and market trends. At any time, users can investigate topics such as treatment gaps, emerging research, or real-time sentiment on a specific therapeutic area. This extensive coverage and the ability to unify many streams of information provide powerful support for decision making within life sciences organizations.

Description: A digital health platform that uses analysis of eye-movements as a biomarker to assess brain health across neurological disorders.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Software
Full Description: Eysz is developing a digital health platform that measures disease progression, intervention efficacy and side effects to assist clinicians in developing a personalized care plan for neurological diseases. Doctors currently rely on patient self-reported data and subjective clinical exams to manage and treat chronic neurological disorders.  The lack of a reliable biomarker in neurological disease leads to economic burdens of $1.7T in the US and Europe alone and stagnant patient outcomes with no significant improvement in outcomes in the last 30 years. Eysz is using analysis of eye-movements as a biomarker to assess brain health across neurological disorders starting with epilepsy – a disorder characterized by recurrent seizures.    After completing a successful clinical study sponsored by the NIH and NSF Eysz will be releasing their first product to diagnose and monitor childhood absence epilepsy in Q3 2023.

It addresses the unique challenges of building in-house stable and secure MLOps systems at scale.  Unlike observability solutions, Fiddler seamlessly integrates deep XAI and analytics to help you grow into advanced capabilities over time and build a framework for responsible AI practices. F500 organizations use Fiddler across training and production models to accelerate AI time-to-value and scale and increase revenue by connecting predictions to business context (or providing visibility into model performance and behavior).

Full Description: GEn1E Lifesciences is a Clinical-stage, multi-target company with a unique AI platform. They develop novel, next-generation, immunomodulatory therapies for rare & inflammatory diseases with no effective treatments. GEn1E is supercharging the drug development cycle by applying AI to multiple-mechanism-of-action protein targets and their natural platform capabilities—creating novel therapeutics at an unprecedented pace. Their AI platform has enabled them to develop a purpose-built therapy for ARDS to reduce its $20 billion cost on society (just in the USA).    GEn1E has built a rich pipeline of 21+ novel and selective immunomodulators and has plans to accelerate 2 additional devastating diseases (beyond their lead indication) to IND in the next 12 months. Their AI platform enables tremendous pace and capital efficiency as demonstrated by their progress in ~2 years with seed capital—a stark contrast to the typical spend of $100M+ and 7+ years exhibited in the pharmaceuticals / biotech industry.   With ~90% of rare diseases having no therapeutic treatment at all, GEn1E is taking a giant swing that will hopefully bring life-saving therapies to the lives of patients in need.   GEn1E’s team has decades of experience in drug development and machine learning, and they graduated from YCombinator and Stanford-StartX in late 2019. GEn1E is based in Palo Alto, CA.

Industries: Natural Language Processing, Sales, Sales Automation
Description: Autobound increases email reply rate by generating individually personalized sales emails using AI.
Top 5 Investors: Dundee Venture Capital
Founders: Daniel Wiener, Kyle Schuster, Tanner McRae
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Sales and Marketing, Software
Full Description: Autobound increases email reply rate by generating individually personalized sales emails using AI. Anyone using Google Chrome can get started in less than 30 seconds! Overview: Our AI scans through millions of prospect insights, then incorporates the most relevant into a compelling, persona-specific message. ➤ How it works By instantly researching the recipient in the “To:” field in your drafted email, Autobound scours millions of data sources from across the web, then aggregates insights unique to both your email recipient and their employer. We’ve trained our AI on millions of high performing sales emails to identify what works best. With a single click, Autobound generates a list of emails, and email openers, that are proven to spark conversations. ➤ Where it works You can use Autobound no matter what site you’re on! Our widget stays tucked away on the side of your screen, adjustable to where you want it. We have native integrations with LinkedIn, Gmail, Outreach, and Salesloft. For Gmail, Outreach and Salesloft Autobound starts working when you enter a recipient’s email address into the “to” field of an email. With 1 click, you can view Autobound’s suggested emails and email openers. On LinkedIn When you’re viewing a person's profile, Autobound is researching them, their industry, and company behind the scenes. Similar to Gmail/Outreach/Salesloft, when you click the Autobound icon, we’ll display personalized emails, email openers, and relevant insights. Any other website Simply click the Autobound icon to open “Autobound Anywhere”. From here, you can enter someone’s email or LinkedIn Profile URL, and Autobound will generate personalized content. ➤ What drives our personalization Autobound’s “listening engine” combs through the digital footprint of your email recipient, their employer, and industry to surface the most relevant insights. Some of the insights we track… On the INDIVIDUAL level: initiatives in current role, interests and hobbies, job changes, work anniversaries, schools attended, promotions & more. We’ll also identify experiences they share with you, such as if you both worked at the same company, live in the same city, etc. On the COMPANY level: funding rounds, acquisitions, press releases, company initiatives, names of customers/investors, product launches, competitive technologies used, and more. ➤ Get started today Getting started is free, takes 30 seconds, and doesn’t require a credit card. All you have to do is install the Chrome Extension.

Then, layers of additional sensors and functionality provide more and more value towards profits and even sustainability goals—while keeping the user experience simple, modular, and scalable. Guidewheel was founded out of Stanford University and is already successful with hundreds of manufacturers—reporting an average of 40% runtime improvement—with results featured in IndustryWeek and selection by the World Economic Forum as a Tech Pioneer, one of the companies most likely to have a significant impact on business and society.   Guidewheel’s vision is to become the real-time intelligence layer and platform that empowers all the world’s 10 million factories to reach sustainable peak performance. Quantum computing makes it possible to represent multiple states of the protein simultaneously and efficiently find the best designs. The team created the world’s first peptide designed on a quantum computer and is now working on peptide therapeutics for oncology and neurodegeneration, as well as on enzymes for industrial applications.

Seva Exchange is a Delaware "C" Benefit Corporation, spun out of Timebanks.org. Edgar Cahn, the father of timebanking was the Chairman of our Board of Directors for the first two years. We are continuing to evolve Timebanks.org’s legacy of pioneering and scaling the exchange of services and time credits between volunteers. We have also embraced the Asset Based Community Development principles, where communities list out and share resources. "We have what we need if we share what we have," is our mantra. Anitha Beberg is our founder and CEO. We aspire to create positive social impact by equipping communities and nonprofit organizations with applications to make the most of local talents and raise themselves up.

Hopstack's platform empowers businesses to gain control of their warehouse operations, eliminate chokepoints and improve fulfillment throughput without scaling costs.  The digital warehouse software comes integrated with most of the commonly used hardware (Scanners, Printers, Robots, AGVs, AMRs, etc.), and other software platforms (ERPs, e-commerce marketplaces, shipping carriers, etc.). Hopstack’s proprietary algorithms enable self-learning process improvements including order batching, route optimizations, and dynamic task allocation to warehouse associates and stations based on workload and availability. Hopstack currently has e-commerce, 3PL, and manufacturing clientele in North America (US and Canada), and South-East Asia.

Description: "Data from Life. Data for Life."
Top 5 Investors: Government of United States of America, Tom X Lee, SVTC + Constellar Ventures, Lu Yoh-Chie, David B. Kirk
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Health Care, Mobile, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: BioTrillion is a San Francisco-based HealthTech AI startup revolutionizing healthcare by transforming smartphones into powerful health monitoring tools. Our platform, BioEngine4D™, leverages AI-powered computer vision to measure 10 vital signs and disease biomarkers through simple 10-second video selfies—a "HealthySelfie." By democratizing access to health monitoring, we aim to empower a billion people worldwide to take proactive control of their health—anyone, anywhere, anytime. BioTrillion addresses the critical gap in accessible, continuous health monitoring. Traditional methods are confined to clinical settings and require specialized equipment, limiting timely detection of health issues, especially in underserved populations. Our target customers include individuals seeking proactive health management, healthcare providers aiming to enhance patient monitoring, and healthcare enterprises seeking scalable AI-driven solutions. By transforming smartphones into health monitoring devices, we democratize access to vital health assessments. Our "HealthySelfie" app, powered by our BioEngine4D HealthAI platform, measures 10 signs that are traditionally assessed by doctors in medical settings to obtain insights into the function of key organs in your body—Brain, Heart, Skin, and more.  BioTrillion unlocks the power of your smartphone to effectively put a "digital doctor in your pocket" — accessible anytime, anywhere. Consumer Users can:  •  Compare your results relative to global population data and track changes over time. •  Receive a personalized and understandable analysis of what your unique combination of results mean, powered by our "DiseaseSignatures" analytics (beta). Ideal for Enterprises: •  Providers for more informative telehealth. •  Pharma for decentralized clinical trials. •  Payors for better risk management. HealthySelfie—Better Health, By Yourself!

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Information Technology, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Intain is building Intelligent Blockchains for transparency and efficiency in capital markets, starting with structured finance. Asset-backed investment volumes (including mortgage-backed securities and other financings) have touched pre-crisis levels, but the only major change since the financial crisis is an increased compliance burden, with little in terms of transparency or improved efficiency. Between the issuance and ongoing management of these investments, anywhere between four to eight intermediaries get involved with annual costs in excess of $30B across Securitization and other financing.   Intain gets lenders, issuers, investors and other parties like servicers, trustees and rating agencies on a shared-data platform for these transactions that uses artificial intelligence and certain features of blockchain for: -  seamless flow of data with zero reconciliation - complete transparency with provenance of asset and data  Intain is extending this to receivables financing, ESG bonds and development finance. Next step is to add trust and transparency to digital assets by bringing their "NAV" on blockchain.  Committed to diversity in fintech, half of Intain's employees are women. All our employees work in an environment that blends a research lab and start-up and a research lab.

As the Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) core advances, it becomes more powerful, with a broader data reach, and more advanced cognition, planning, prediction, vocational and communication skills. Companies could use it to plan their corporate strategy via their current Enterprise Resource Planning tools by interfacing them to our AGI and having it watch and learn their company’s internal operations, gather data about their whole ecosystem of customers, suppliers, partners, competitors, and the other market factors, then forecast different timelines and how they evolve into the future differently according to their decisions, allowing you to optimize their corporate decision-making and plan effective prescient timelines for product development, marketing/PR, sales, finance, legal,… into the future. They can access AGI professional services like Finance, Legal, Medical, Counselor, Fitness Advisor, and hundreds of others, and these services would be available globally, rivaling the best such services by humans. An Artificial General Intelligence will quickly become the most powerful tool that humanity has ever had, making the revolutions spawned by electricity, computers, and the internet pale by comparison. Where we are now overwhelmed by a world's worth of information we could never humanly assimilate in our work lives and our personal lives, we will have something that can for go through it all for us, and give us exactly what we need, when we need it.

Full Description: Hannah Systems’ mission is to deliver open and anonymous traffic data, never utilizing personal information, bringing focus to the most important tasks at hand, reducing emissions, improving congestion, and ultimately changing the way we live. Hannah Systems is making a difference in a progressive and socially beneficial way and we are emphasizing this objective by becoming a Public Benefit Corp. Hannah is a B2B software company that creates openness and the democratization of data, free from the location-based advertising business model.  The Hannah Systems AI was developed by a team of PhDs and traffic engineers and provides detailed intersection data, resulting in a more comprehensive view of the city leading to less time spent in traffic.  At Hannah Systems we enhance traffic data with AI technology and share this anonymous data via our open data platform. This enriched information enables analysis of traffic patterns and pedestrian activity, and reduces travel time, pollution, and congestion. Hannah Systems’ enhanced data can help cities redesign light phasing and surface new routes that can genuinely improve travel times. Traffic information is the catalyst that can bring about change, however, data has become increasingly more personalized and is a protected and proprietorial asset that it is not being utilized to help our cities. The Hannah Systems detailed traffic information makes travel more efficient, reducing the stress and anxiety of city driving, reducing emissions and making roads safer. The Hannah Systems open data platform is the foundation for companies looking to improve pedestrian safety, reduce emissions, streamline traffic and address the needs of the AV industry. Hannah Systems is partnering with cities around the globe in order to deliver the next generation of open, anonymous, and ethically managed traffic data. Hannah provides a deep understanding of congestion problems through advanced analytics, microsimulation of every intersection, a macro view of the overall city and the Hannah Systems’ Traffic AI.

Full Description: Filio solves a problem that many can relate to: you take a bunch of photos, and then never get around to organizing them. The photos just sit in your phone’s gallery, or maybe in a folder on your computer, but all the details are often lost to history. It is no different for construction and other projects. Employees frequently document projects via photos but miss important details or, when they download the photos days later, forget the exact context or location of many of the images. Filio provides a solution via a cloud-based, integrated mobile and web-based software application that facilitates collection and management of visual information (photos and videos). Filio enables enhanced information collection by augmenting the captured images and videos with geospatial data as well as custom user-defined metadata (such as captions and tags), and uses state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and computer vision for smart labeling and cataloging.

Description: MEI Micro, Inc. is developing the world's first navigation grade MEMS inertial sensor system platform
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Consumer Electronics, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Health Care, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: MEI Micro, Inc. is a U.S. based developer of next-generation MEMs inertial sensor technology developing the industry's first navigation-grade, chip-scale, multi-axis MEMS inertial sensing system platform.  The company's proprietary 3DS MEMs system platform is a key enabling technology for the high accuracy, lowest CSWaP (cost, size, weight and power) inertial measurement units (IMUs), inertial navigation systems (INSs) and Assured Position, Navigation and Timing (A-PNT) systems.  This critical dual-use technology provides the absolute lowest cost for high accuracy inertial data, critical to the development and implementation of artificial intelligence/machine learning especially for EDGE devices, including networked systems such as air, land, and sea based unmanned systems.  MEI Micro’s 3DS can also provide the lowest cost, high accuracy technology for platform stabilization for image sensors (LIDAR, Radar, Sonar) in order to improve image resolution to further improve the sensor fusion software of A-PNT systems and other targeting related systems.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Health Care, Machine Learning, Medical, Software
Description: We built an oral disease screening platform using AI and imaging to allow any medical professional to catch oral diseases earlier.
Top 5 Investors: Illinois Ventures, Health Wildcatters, HAX
Founders: Aashay Patel, Ayush Kumar, Mark O'Connor
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: At Vitrix Health, we created a more accessible oral health screening solution. We use optics paired with machine learning on a mobile platform to enable medical primary care providers (PCP) to screen for oral diseases more effectively. Given the link between oral and systemic health, this improves outcomes and costs for the 108M Americans that don’t see a dentist but do see a doctor every year and other high-risk groups.[1] Our technology reduces disparities in oral health by empowering the PCP to detect disease and intelligently refer the right patients to a dentist. Our device is pilot testing in Mt. Sinai Hospital in New York, Carle Clinic in Illinois, and University Of Chicago Medical School in Illinois. We also have 2 international clinical trials with the Rotary Foundation in Bolivia and Manipal College of Dentistry in India.
